testcase.name: consult an user
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseGet = read ('classpath:karate/request/responseGet.json') .... passed Given path 'users','1' .................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseGet ......................................... passed And assert response.name == "Leanne Graham" ............................... passed And assert response.username == "Bret" .................................... passed And assert response.address.suite == "Apt. 556" ........................... passed And assert response.company.name == "Romaguera-Crona" .................... passed
